full_text: (15) Fill in this block only if you claim citizenship through your mother's marriage to your stepfather. The full name of my stepfather is ; he was born on (Month) (Day) (Year) at ; and resides at (City) (State or country) (Street address, city and State or country. If dead, show He became a citizen of the United States by birth; naturalization on "dead" and date of death.) (Month) (Day) (Year) in the Certificate No. ; through his (Name of court, city, and State) parent (s), and issued Certificate No. A or AA (was) (was not) He since lost United States citizenship. (If citizenship lost, on a separate sheet this size state how and (has) (has not) when he lost and attach it, showing question number.) He and my mother were married to each other on at (Month) (Day) (Year) (City and State or country) My mother is of the race. She (was, was not) issued Certificate No. A Before marrying my mother, my stepfather was married time (s), as follows: (1, 2, 3, etc.) DATE MARRIAGE How MARRIAGE ENDED DATE MARRIED NAME OF WIFE ENDED (Death or divorce) (16) Fill in this block only if you are or were a married woman. I have been married time(s), as follows: (1, 2, 3, etc.) How MARRIAGE ENDED DATE MARRIAGE DATE MARRIED NAME OF HUSBAND CITIZENSHIP OF HUSBAND ENDED (Death or divorce) (17) Fill in this block only if you claim citizenship through a husband. Name of citizen husband ; he was born on (Give full and complete name) (Month) (Day) (Year) at ; and resides at (City) (State or country) (Street address, city and State or country. If dead, show He became a citizen of the United States by birth; naturalization on "dead" and date of death.) (Month) (Day) (Year) in the Certificate No. ; through his (Name of court, city, and State) parent(s) and issued Certificate No. A or AA (was) (was not) He since lost United States citizenship. (If citizenship lost, on a separate sheet this size state how and (has) (has not) when he lost and attach it, showing question number.) I am of the race. Before my marriage to him, he was married time (s), as follows: (1, 2, 3, etc.) DATE MARRIAGE How MARRIAGE ENDED DATE MARRIED NAME OF WIFE ENDED (Death or divorce) (18) Fill in this block if any member of your immediate family has submitted or is submitting a similar application to an office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service. WHEN APPLICATION CERTIFICATE No. AND FILE No., IF KNOWN, NAME OF RELATIVE RELATIONSHIP SUBMITTED AND LOCATION OF OFFICE (19) I heretofore filed an application for a certificate of citizenship (have) (have not) on , 19 at (SIGN HERE) Herman Detz (Signature of applicant or parent or guardian) (3)
